section_title: EFFECTIVENESS OF THE IPCC EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE
sentences: On Tuesday, IPCC Chair Pachauri elaborated on the Executive Committee, saying that it had been an extremely productive and effective innovation.
He noted that the Committee holds routine monthly meetings, 90% of the time they are held electronically, and minutes are made available to focal points and are available for the record.
enb_long_title: Thirty-seventh session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-37)
